name: express-metrics
description: Express middleware to log the metrics traces

scripts.coverage: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -R dot test/environment.js test/unit/*-test.js test/unit/**/*-test.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && npm run lint
scripts.travis: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec test/environment.js test/*-test.js test/unit/**/*-test.js && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
